data.text: @CaulfieldTim @drninashapiro @Forbes @DrJenGunter @DrPaulOffit There is a dire need for a FACTccination program for many people.

@CaulfieldTim @drninashapiro @Forbes @DrJenGunter @DrPaulOffit Yes, hucksters and liars are using absence of evidence as proof. What vaccine has caused infertility? We also have no studies of the 50-year effects of the vaccine, for some reason

@CaulfieldTim @MichaelBuratovi @drninashapiro @Forbes @DrJenGunter @DrPaulOffit The fertility studies aren’t done yet, actually.  Now, if you want to debate the translational relevance of animal models, you might want to check out my pinned tweet as I discuss this issue as it pertains to my field. https://t.co/EjVgw31URB
@CaulfieldTim @drninashapiro @Forbes @DrJenGunter @DrPaulOffit Oh good grief. What other steaming pile of crap will the internet subject us to about the vaccines?
